for the preservation of the heritage of the Roerichs
главноеописание: The international public organization <International Committee for the Preservation of the Roerichs' Heritage> was established in 2012 to preserve, in accordance with the will of the Roerich family, their artistic, philosophical, scientific, literary, memorial heritage, wherever it is and its proper use in accordance with this will.
Помочь деятельности Комитета по сохранен: Help the activities of the Committee for the Preservation of the Roerichs' Heritage!
help1: Raising funds for the restoration of the cultural activities of the public Museum named after Nicholas Roerich of the International Center of the Roerichs
help2: Assistance in restoring the activities of the public Museum named after Nicholas Roerich can be provided by transferring funds to our accounts (in Belarusian and Russian rubles)
Будем благодарны любой вашей поддержке!: We will be grateful for any of your support!
